vis_config.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                VIS_CONFIG
00004 !
00005 !  Interactive control of target config
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine vis_config
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015   include 'mpif.h'
00016 
00017   integer :: i, p, ierr
00018   integer :: lvisit_active
00019 
00020   integer :: isteer1 = 0, isteer2 =0, isteer3=0, isteer4=1
00021   real*8 :: dsteer1, dsteer2, dsteer3, dsteer4
00022 
00023  
00024   integer, save :: np_beam_dt  ! current # beam particles
00025 
00026   ! First check for VISIT connection
00027 
00028 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00029   if (me==0)   call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00030   call MPI_BCAST( lvisit_active, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00031 #endif
00032 
00033   if (lvisit_active==0 )then
00034      if (me==0) write(*,*) 'VISNB | No connection to visualization'
00035      return
00036   endif
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00041 
00042   if (me==0) then
00043 
00044      call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00045 
00046      ! Fetch real-time, user-specified control parameters
00047      if (lvisit_active /= 0) then 
00048         call flvisit_nbody2_steering_recv( dsteer1,dsteer2,dsteer3, dsteer4,isteer1,isteer2,isteer3,isteer4)
00049 
00050         ivis = isteer2
00051         ivis_fields=isteer3
00052         target_geometry = max(isteer4,0)  ! Target geom 0-8
00053 
00054         stretch: select case(target_geometry)
00055 
00056         case(0,5) ! slab & wedge
00057            x_plasma = dsteer4 
00058 
00059         case(1,11,2,3,13,4,6,16,26,36) ! spherical/cylindrical
00060            r_sphere = dsteer4
00061            x_plasma = min(dsteer4/2.,dsteer3)
00062 
00063         case(12) ! tube
00064            r_sphere = dsteer4
00065            z_plasma = min(dsteer4/2.,dsteer3)
00066 
00067         case default
00068            r_sphere = dsteer4
00069            x_plasma = dsteer3
00070 
00071         end select stretch
00072 
00073         if (isteer1 == 1) launch = .true.  ! Start simulation if launch box clicked.
00074 
00075         write(*,*) 'VISCO | vis freq = ',ivis
00076         write(*,*) 'VISCO | geometry = ',isteer4
00077         write(*,*) 'VISCO | nparts = ',npart_total
00078 
00079      else
00080         write(*,*) 'VISCO | No connection to visualization'
00081         return
00082      endif
00083      
00084   endif
00085 
00086 #endif
00087 
00088   ! Broadcast beam parameters to all other PEs
00089   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)   ! Synchronize first
00090   call MPI_BCAST( lvisit_active, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00091 
00092   if (lvisit_active /= 0) then
00093      call MPI_BCAST( ivis, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00094      call MPI_BCAST( ivis_fields, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00095      call MPI_BCAST( target_geometry, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00096      call MPI_BCAST( x_plasma, 1, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00097      call MPI_BCAST( r_sphere, 1, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00098      call MPI_BCAST( launch, 1, MPI_LOGICAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00099   else
00100      if (me==0) write(*,*) ' No Connection to Visualization'
00101      return
00102   endif
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106 end subroutine vis_config
